org.liris.smartgov.simulator.urban.osm.agent

Class OsmAgent

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.liris.smartgov.simulator.core.agent.core.Agent<MoverAction>
      • org.liris.smartgov.simulator.core.agent.moving.MovingAgent

          • org.liris.smartgov.simulator.urban.osm.agent.OsmAgent

  • public class OsmAgent
extends GeoAgent
    An agent that moves in the osm graph using a basic behavior.

      static OsmAgent randomTrafficOsmAgent(java.lang.String id, OsmContext context, OsmAgentBody body)
      Creates an agent that will spawn on a random source node from the current context and go to a random sink node, using the shortest path.

    • Method Detail

      • randomTrafficOsmAgent

        public static OsmAgent randomTrafficOsmAgent(java.lang.String id,
                                             OsmContext context,
                                             OsmAgentBody body)
        Creates an agent that will spawn on a random source node from the current context and go to a random sink node, using the shortest path. When the agent reaches its destination, it spawns on a new random source node and so on, as specified by the RandomTrafficBehavior.
        Parameters:
        id - agent id
        context - current context, containing source and sink nodes
        body - initialized osm agent body
        Returns:
        a random traffic agent
